titleStmt.title: Minerua Britanna or A garden of heroical deuises furnished, and adorned with emblemes and impresa's of sundry natures, newly devised, moralized, and published, by Henry Peacham, Mr. of Artes.
titleStmt.author: Peacham, Henry, 1576?-1643?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed in Shoe-lane at the signe of the Faulcon by Wa: Dight,

notesStmt.note: The second part has separate title page; pagination and register are continuous.
With "the author's conclusion, dated 1612. Variant: text ends on 2F1v without the conclusion.
Reproduction of the original in Harvard University. Library.

place.placeName: Shoe-lane at the signe of the Faulcon
